attributes.action: Give more help to overweight people to loose weight and stop obesity discrimination by heath care professionals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems to have become acceptable for heath care professionals to deny treatment to overweight individuals even after they have asked for help. We should be supporting people who are willing to loose weight not persecuting them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
